nodes.text: The Monument to Lost Navigators was a statue in the city of Cinnagar, the capital of Empress Teta. Commemorating those that had lost their lives exploring new hyperspace routes, the statue stood in front of the Hyperspace Navigator's Guild's headquarters. Made of carbonite, the statue was carved in the likeness of the ancient patriarch of a Coruscanti family that was said to have blazed the Koros Trunk Line aboard a generation ship.
